WE ARE THE FIRST CANNABIS STREAMING COMPANY

The model is simple: We provide funding for facility expansions, operations and initial construction in exchange for minority equity interests and a portion of the cultivation production. We provide the platform for growth so our partners can focus on innovation.

Our model allows our streaming partners to exceed their growth potential and to achieve success.

We are not interested in creating a monopoly. We are interested in creating value for companies and allowing them to exceed their growth potential and to achieve success.

Our streaming partners have access to our deep strategic and industry relationships to help create value, drive brand awareness and build their customer base.

Our collective insights and experiences allow Cannabis Wheaton to provide our streaming partners real-world guidance for every stage this ever-evolving landscape.

20+

Clinic relationships and growing

25K+

Access to ACMPR registered patients

Benefits of the Cannabis Wheaton model

FUTURE PRODUCT POSITIONING

We empower our streaming partners to nurture their brand equity and deliver the right message to the right audience in the medical community.

As Canada moves towards an adult recreational market, Cannabis Wheaton will facilitate a seamless protocol to build and grow their product offering, while respecting new regulations for advertising and marketing.

DIVERSIFICATION

At Cannabis Wheaton we believe there is strength in numbers. We invest and support a wide range of cannabis cultivation companies that make up our roster of streaming partners each with a unique offering, based on their individual leadership teams and expertise, and specialized growing techniques and innovations.

Production is diversified across many streaming partners, reducing the risk associated with build-out delays, licensing delays, poor harvests, etc.  

Given the reduced production risk, Cannabis Wheaton represents the ideal partner for medical clinics and any other distribution channel.

UPSIDE

Currently, significant shareholder value is created as applicant licensed producers advance through the Health Canada licensing process; however, there is limited access and significant risk in investing in those still in the application stage of licensing.   Cannabis Wheaton creates an opportunity for investors to access these licensed producers with significant upside potential, while mitigating risk through diversification, value and the expertise of our management team.

BEST BRANDS

Cannabis Wheaton provides our streaming partners with customized branding solutions that not only comply with the Canadian regulations, but that also speak to and resonate with the Canadian market. We also work with leading global cannabis brands that want to enter into the Canadian market.
